DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the clinical variables that may be used to predict who among the solid organ transplant recipients will develop cytomegalovirus (CMV) disease after completing antiviral prophylaxis.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors for Cytomegalovirus Disease in Solid Organ Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: This study will investigate the clinical and laboratory variables that may be used to predict who among the solid organ transplant recipients will develop CMV disease after completing antiviral prophylaxis. This is a retrospective study of patients seen at the Mayo Clinic during the past five years.
DOC.criteria: Recipients of liver, kidney, pancreas, heart or lung transplantation
